system.description:
When you set up a meeting with a powerful or dangerous individual in a crowded mundane space (museum, restaurant, etc.), hold 2. You can spend your hold, 1 for 1, to:

  • create an opening for you or another character to @UUID[Compendium.urban-shadows-pbta.play-materials.Item.Hs7dK9pL3mN6oQ2r]{escape a situation}

  • take +1 forward to @UUID[Compendium.urban-shadows-pbta.play-materials.Item.Hs7dK9pL3mN6oQ2r]{escaping a situation}

  • choose for the MC when you @UUID[Compendium.urban-shadows-pbta.play-materials.Item.Hs7dK9pL3mN6oQ2r]{escape a situation} and roll a 7-9
